name: 烈火冲锋The charge is the fire
name_original: 烈火冲锋The charge is the fire
description:
The sequel will be an FPS+RPG, and the story will be an extension of this game's story, with a richer content and more Chinese elements.

And
I really hope you all have fun!

Note:


1.Non-English characters including Cyrillic in the user path are not supported.
2.Your system input method must be switched to English input method when playing the game.
